product_name: CamelBak L.U.X.E. Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz. - Women's
long_description: This low-profile CamelBak L.U.X.E. hydration pack boasts a women-specific design for excellent comfort, plus plenty of gear capacity and a 100 fl. oz. reservoir for all-day mountain biking sessions. 100 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir has its own, rear-entry compartment and is equipped with the Quick Link(TM) connection system for easy removal of the drinking tube. Quick Link system also lets you effortlessly add accessories such as a Fresh(TM) filter, insulated tube, tube director or flow meter (accessories sold separately). Big Bite(TM) valve is ergonomically positioned for easy drinking; valve securely shuts off water flow with an easy, quick turn. Women-specific design includes soft contact points, a narrow, curved shoulder harness and a slider sternum strap; hipbelt is removable. Lightweight XV(TM) back panel offers excellent cross-ventilation to help keep your back cool. Main compartment, front zippered pocket with internal organization and lined, zippered media pocket store and organize gear; expandable scoop pocket holds extra gear. Helmet attachment points make it easy to secure your helmet during transport. Side compression straps let you cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying. CamelBak L.U.X.E. hydration pack has reflective detailing that increases your visibility in low light.
short_description: This low-profile CamelBak L.U.X.E. hydration pack boasts a women-specific design for excellent comfort, plus plenty of gear capacity and a 100 fl. oz. reservoir for all-day mountain biking sessions.
